name: Premium Hot Melt 5100
description: High-performance hot melt adhesive ideal for packaging and bookbinding applications
fullDescription: Premium Hot Melt 5100 is a versatile thermoplastic adhesive offering excellent bond strength and heat resistance. Perfect for high-speed packaging lines and bookbinding operations.

name: Ultra Bond HM-200
description: Superior adhesion for wood and furniture applications
fullDescription: Ultra Bond HM-200 provides exceptional bonding for wood assembly with fast setting time and excellent heat resistance. Ideal for furniture manufacturing and carpentry.

name: FastSet Adhesive 3000
description: Quick-setting adhesive for textile and automotive use
fullDescription: FastSet Adhesive 3000 offers rapid bonding with excellent flexibility. Perfect for textile lamination and automotive interior assembly.

name: Industrial HM Pro
description: Professional-grade hot melt for industrial applications
fullDescription: Industrial HM Pro delivers consistent performance in demanding industrial environments. Excellent for electronics assembly and general manufacturing.

name: Packaging Master HM
description: Specialized adhesive for carton and case sealing
fullDescription: Packaging Master HM is engineered for high-speed packaging lines with superior grab and excellent heat resistance for secure carton sealing.

name: FlexBond HM-400
description: Flexible bonding solution for packaging and labels
fullDescription: FlexBond HM-400 provides excellent flexibility and cold resistance. Ideal for flexible packaging and pressure-sensitive label applications.

name: HighTemp Adhesive 600
description: Heat-resistant adhesive for extreme conditions
fullDescription: HighTemp Adhesive 600 maintains bond integrity at elevated temperatures. Perfect for applications requiring superior heat resistance.

name: Crystal Clear Resin R100
description: Premium transparent resin for coating applications
fullDescription: Crystal Clear Resin R100 offers exceptional clarity and UV resistance. Perfect for high-gloss coatings and printing inks.

name: UltraGloss Resin 250
description: High-gloss resin for premium coatings
fullDescription: UltraGloss Resin 250 delivers outstanding gloss and durability. Ideal for automotive and industrial coating systems.

name: FlexCoat Resin FC-300
description: Flexible resin for coating and adhesive formulations
fullDescription: FlexCoat Resin FC-300 provides excellent flexibility and adhesion. Perfect for flexible coating systems and adhesive formulations.

name: Marine Grade Resin MG-400
description: Corrosion-resistant resin for marine applications
fullDescription: Marine Grade Resin MG-400 offers superior corrosion resistance and water resistance. Ideal for marine coatings and protective systems.

name: EcoResin E-500
description: Environmentally friendly resin for sustainable coatings
fullDescription: EcoResin E-500 is a low VOC solution for eco-conscious applications. Perfect for sustainable coating formulations.

name: Powder Coat Resin PC-600
description: Specialized resin for powder coating systems
fullDescription: Powder Coat Resin PC-600 delivers excellent flow and leveling in powder coating applications. Ideal for metal finishing.

name: UV Cure Resin UV-700
description: Fast-curing UV resin for coatings and inks
fullDescription: UV Cure Resin UV-700 provides instant curing under UV light. Perfect for high-speed UV coating and printing applications.

name: Titanium White TW-100
description: High-opacity white pigment for various applications
fullDescription: Titanium White TW-100 offers exceptional hiding power and brightness. Ideal for paints, coatings, and plastic applications.

name: Carbon Black CB-200
description: Pure carbon black pigment for deep black coloration
fullDescription: Carbon Black CB-200 provides intense black color with excellent dispersion. Perfect for inks, plastics, and rubber compounds.

name: Iron Oxide Red IR-130
description: Durable red pigment for construction and coatings
fullDescription: Iron Oxide Red IR-130 offers excellent weather resistance and color stability. Ideal for construction materials and exterior coatings.

name: Organic Yellow OY-250
description: Bright yellow organic pigment for high-quality applications
fullDescription: Organic Yellow OY-250 delivers vibrant yellow with excellent lightfastness. Perfect for printing inks and plastic coloring.

name: Phthalocyanine Blue PB-300
description: Brilliant blue pigment with excellent properties
fullDescription: Phthalocyanine Blue PB-300 provides intense blue color with superior lightfastness. Ideal for high-performance coatings and inks.

name: Chrome Green CG-400
description: Stable green pigment for industrial use
fullDescription: Chrome Green CG-400 offers excellent heat stability and chemical resistance. Perfect for industrial coatings and plastic applications.
